item.title: Lessons in Adulthood
item.description: Crossroads My year of service with City Year, New Hampshire was coming to an end. I knew that I didn’t want to become a teacher anymore, but I still liked the idea of shaping the young minds of the future, so I applied to Boston University’s Masters program in Educational Leadership and Policy Studies. I was waiting for my flight home in O’Hare International Airport when I received the news.
